issue.title: [Rust] [DateFusion] Improve performance of parquet scan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9452](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9452). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I found a trivial optimization to significantly speed up the parquet scan by changing the channel communication between threads. PR coming up shortly.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9452?focusedCommentId=17157060) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Interesting. I saw that some perf comparison has been done between this and Spark. Curious what is the result after this optimization?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9452?focusedCommentId=17157749) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7743
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7743>
